# nimma

> JSON Path expressions?  I mog *nimma*, aba naja. :trollface: 

## Install

```sh
yarn add nimma
```

or if npm is package manager of your choice

```sh
npm install nimma --save
```

## Usage

Will add some later.

## Thanks

- David Chester for [JSONPath expression parser](https://github.com/dchester/jsonpath).
